integration_patterns: Azure Functions for Health Data Processing

evidence.claim: CarePoint utilizes AWS cloud services for scalable health technologies.
FHIR is used for health data exchange at CarePoint.
CarePoint adheres to HL7 standards for interoperability.
CarePoint leverages Azure for health information management.
